title: Mistakes Managers Should Avoid
excerpt: Some managers keep diaries of their on-the-job mistakes, partly to avoid repeating errors, and partly to make employees comfortable with failure. At least one added cartoons.

title: Deliberate Practice: A Mindful & Methodical Way to Master Any Skill
excerpt: Each and every day we eat, we sleep, we read, we brush our teeth. So why haven't we all become world-class masters of eating, sleeping, reading, and teeth-brushing?
